name: Seed of Life (2016)
description:
This game generates various mathematical patterns. To browse a gallery of animations, visit our Instagram page: http://www.instagram.com/seedoflifeapp

Seed of Life is a meditative action game in which you deflect colourful elements to create sacred patterns.

Protect the Seed of Life in the center from incoming elements by rotating a paddle on a circular canvas. Deflecting elements will fill the sky with a dance of colors that form sacred geometrical patterns, but stay vigilant; as elements move and behave in ways that will surprise and challenge you.

With hundreds of unique and dazzling compositions, Seed of Life offers a meditative experience of joy and comprehension through its puzzle-action gameplay, and atmospheric visual and aural feedback designed to deeply immerse you in a variety of allegorical themes.
